tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BuildingBlueprints (
    blueprint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    blueprint_name TEXT,
    architect_name TEXT,
    construction_start_date DATE,
    construction_end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE building_blueprints (
 blueprint_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 blueprint_name VARCHAR(255),
 architect_name VARCHAR(255),
 construction_timeline TIMESTAMP,
 blueprint_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE project_budgets (
 project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 project_name VARCHAR(255),
 budget_amount DECIMAL,
 budget_approved BOOLEAN,
 budget_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
	project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	project_name TEXT,
	architect_id INT,
	timeline_id INT,
	budget_id INT
);
